title: Sweyn Forkbeard
summary: Sweyn Forkbeard (/svɛn/; Old Norse: Sveinn Haraldsson tjúguskegg [ˈswɛinː ˈhɑrˌɑldsˌson ˈtjuːɣoˌskeɡː];[2] Danish: Svend Tveskæg; 17 April 963[1] – 3 February 1014) was king of Denmark from 986 to 1014. He was the father of King Harald II of Denmark, King Cnut the Great and Queen Estrid Svendsdatter.
